bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Item Combined Designation of the central spot or top of all types of chuang yang 瘡瘍， sores and ulcers. In general it is from the heads of sores that suppuration occurs. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 一者，瘡頭烏而強凹；二者，瘡頭白而腫實 , “The first is: the heads of the sores are black, with a hard indentation. The second is: the heads of the sores are white and swollen with matter”. Chuang tou 瘡根 , the base of sores [4]

① Pathological Item Combined Designation of the base of all types of chuang yang 瘡瘍 , sores and ulcers. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 以針刺瘡中心深至 瘡根，並刺四畔令血出 , “Pierce the center of the sores with a needle down into the sores’ base , and pierce also on its four sides to let blood”.

② Pathological Product Combined Designation of putrid tissues within all types of chuang yang 瘡瘍 , sores and ulcers. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 66: 出却瘡根，便用生肌膏藥封之 , “Remove the sores’ base and then use the ‘ointment to grow muscles’ to close it”.
